title: Fragments of consular fasti
support: Six fragments of a marble plaque, of which five join, and a sixth is distinct.

layout.p: The text preserved belongs to a single column of text, with the sixth fragment belonging to the same column as the others, and containing the end of the column of text; at least one further column must have stood to the right originally.

provenanceFound._: Recovered during the Terme Romane excavations, and now on display in the Antiquarium del Teatro antico

facsimile.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana; photo J. Prag 2017-03-22

museum.name: Antiquarium del Teatro Antico
museum.description: The collection in the "Casina degli Inglesi" consists of 20 inscriptions, 1 statue, two busts, a few mosaics, a 2nd C AD marble sarcophagus and some modern art
